categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The Korriban regiment was a portion of the reconstituted Imperial Army of the Sith Empire that was stationed on the planet Korriban during the Cold War. Around the year 3643 BBY, Sergeant Cormun was a part of the Korriban regiment's Fifth Infantry company.
Unlike most soldiers in the Imperial Army, the men and women of the Korriban regiment's armor was a distinct red, rather than the commonplace gray.
